Changelog

1.0.0

This is the first publicly-announced release. Since none of the previous releases have been publicised in any way, it’s assumed that nobody out there has been using them.

This being the case, the changelog entry for 1.0.0 is effectively the set of all changes since the non-existence of the program until this version. So let’s put that in list form as seems to be customary in changelogs:

  • ppl now exists
Introduction
The very basics
Changelog
The fruit of our labor
Roadmap
The plan for the the future
